snippet.title: Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory is a contraption building game. Design and build your own machines to combine ingredients to make chocolates. Automate production using simple components to create ingenious contraptions, which are as satisfying to watch as they are to optimise.

Wishlist the game and play the demo on Steam right now!

#CaptainContraptionsChocolateFactory #gaming #games
